name: Adventures of Larry the Llama
description:
Play as Larry the llama, and go on a rocket-like adventure to make it through all 5 levels! Meet other llamas and weave your way through moving obstacles.

-------

CONTROLS

W / Up Arrow / Space Bar -> Thrust Up

D / Right Arrow -> Rotate to the Right

A / Left Arrow -> Rotate to the Left

-------

This is my first 3D game, hope you enjoy it :)
